summary: After analyzing the website https://www.cribconnects.com/en/werken-bij, here's what information can be scraped: job application form fields (first name, surname, email, telephone, function, CV upload, motivation upload, LinkedIn URL, notes), company contact information (address, chamber of commerce number, phone number), navigation menu items, and footer links.

content_zones.description: Main job application form with input fields for personal and professional information
Company address, chamber of commerce number and phone number
Main navigation menu with site links
Social media and additional links in footer section

structural_characteristics: Header navigation with multiple menu items
Minimalist design with clear input fields
No complex repeating content blocks or cards
scraping_challenges: Form submission handling required for full interaction
File upload fields require special handling
Limited structured data due to simple form layout
No job listings or detailed career content to scrape
Potential dynamic content loading not visible in static HTML
